p: Four (4) samples ( Fig. 2), each weighing 100 g of the grinned pearl spar were prepared. Two (2) samples were saturated in CH 3OH for 20 min, stirred rigorously before filtered. The filtrate was discarded, while the residual cake and the two (2) samples not soaked in methanol were calcined in an oven furnace at 700 °C for 5–6 h, respectively.
